short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send an action request to a Streamtools widget with remote webhook API

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to connect to the Streamtools service and get the widgets through the API.

Once you have the widgets in the interface you can send actions to be launched from your browser toolbar.
